# Configuration for module: imgpluginDEVIL

elseif (WIN64)

    include/imgpluginDEVIL.h

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES 
    src/imgpluginDEVIL.c
  )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_INSTALL "WIN64" )
  source_group( "Platform Source Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

endif ()

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )


if( LINUX )
  set( MODULE_NAME "imgpluginDEVIL" )
elseif( WIN32 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "imgpluginDEVIL" )
elseif( WIN64 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "imgpluginDEVIL" )
endif()
if( LINUX )
  add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
elseif( WIN32 )
  add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
elseif( WIN64 )
  add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
endif()

if ( LINUX )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefMT gucefCORE DevIL )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefCORE DevIL gucefMT )
  set_target_properties( ${MODULE_NAME} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GUCEF_CODECPLUGIN_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( LINUX )

if ( WIN32 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefMT gucefCORE DevIL )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefCORE DevIL gucefMT )
  set_target_properties( ${MODULE_NAME} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GUCEF_CODECPLUGIN_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefMT gucefCORE DevIL )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefCORE DevIL gucefMT )
  set_target_properties( ${MODULE_NAME} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GUCEF_CODECPLUGIN_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( WIN64 )

endif( LINUX )
